blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=blue]Requesters[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
Use [color=yellow]V[/color] and [color=yellow]H[/color] (by default) to flip [color=green]unloaders[/color]
When placing[color=green] unloaders[/color] on the opposite side to the combinators, connect[item=medium-electric-pole]on both sides with [item=green-wire] AND [item=red-wire]

[font=default-bold]Unbalanced[/font] = some chests are depleted faster than others. Can prolong train unloading process and if there isn't enough deliveries output will suffer
